product_name: olloclip Quick-Flip Case with 3-In-One Lens - iPhone 5/5s
long_description: The olloclip Quick-Flip(TM) Case with 3-In-One Lens turns your iPhone 5/5s into an advanced camera that captures beautiful fish-eye, wide-angle and macro images when you're on the go. Quick-Flip corner rotates so you can easily attach the included 3-In-One Lens; corner becomes a shutter release button that presses the iPhone volume button to take pictures. 3-In-One Lens gives you fish-eye, wide-angle and macro lens capabilities. Macro lens applies roughly a 10x multiplier and allows you to focus the iPhone within 12 - 15mm of the subject; fish-eye lens captures approximately a 180deg field-of-view. Wide-angle lens approximately doubles the field of view of the normal iPhone lens. Included Pro-Photo Adapter slides easily onto the Quick-Flip case for mounting the phone to a tripod or attaching lights, microphones or other attachments (not included). The olloclip Quick-Flip(TM) Case with 3-In-One Lens includes a special adapter that makes the case compatible with the iPod Touch 5th Generation.
short_description: The olloclip Quick-Flip(TM) Case with 3-In-One Lens turns your iPhone 5/5s into an advanced camera that captures beautiful fish-eye, wide-angle and macro images when you're on the go.
